diseases.treatment: Plant looks healthy! Continue regular watering and ensure good sunlight.
Apply fungicide spray. Remove affected leaves. Improve air circulation.
Remove infected plants immediately. Apply copper-based fungicide.
Use copper-based bactericide. Avoid overhead watering. Remove infected leaves.
Apply fungicide weekly. Mulch around plants. Water at soil level only.
Increase air circulation. Apply preventive fungicide. Remove lower leaves.
Excellent condition! Maintain current care routine.
Critical: Remove infected areas. Apply protective fungicide spray.
Apply fungicide at first sign. Rotate crops. Improve soil drainage.
